website_summaries.verdict: These collapsible, space-saving colanders are great for small kitchens.
pros: Pair of collapsible colanders – 8 and 9.5 inches in diameter
Collapsed strainers are more than 2 inches high
Heat resistant up to 230 degrees Fahrenheit
Side holes keep water from collecting
Handles stay cooler than metal colander
Easily fit in top rack of dishwasher
cons: Water tends to pool in the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent space saver
customer_reviews.text: My son has celiac disease and multiple food allergies. To ensure that no one in his shared kitchen uses his kitchen equipment, we made his kit out of only red items. These colanders are great. They are bright red and collapse to next to nothing. The space saving is much appreciated. I was surprised by how sturdy the colander is when unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: SAinVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: usefulness and storage is easy
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are collapsible, colorful, different sizes, made of quality material and very sturdy! Not a dislike, more of product improvement to make it more useful. If the products handles were extendable, it could be hands free. The colander I have that has a handle and I place the handle on one side of the sink and the other on the strainer (since I have a country sink) or else it would be on the middle piece of a normal dual sink. Used for lots of items: pastas (of course), fruits, vegetables, powdered sugar over cakes (worked wonderful)
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLEE HAMILTON

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life??
customer_reviews.text: Colanders are some of the most annoying things to store and wash, but these are fantastic. They work well as colanders, which is important, but then they collapse down to fit super easily into the dishwasher. They take up a fraction of the space in a cabinet that a normal colander would. It's very easy to collapse and expand them, but they're sturdy enough that they would never collapse while in use. For anyone looking for ways to take up more space in your kitchen cabinets and/or dishwasher, I cannot recommend these. Everyone else should buy them now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I got these colanders to put in the camper to save space and we really like them. We actually brought them in the house and that’s what we use all the time now. They collapse to fit in the cupboards to save space perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R Castoldi

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The collapsible colanders are just the right side for a small pot of spaghetti or pasta for two. Once collapsed, they store in a corner taking up minimal space.
customer_reviews.author: Neecy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Dishwasher safe and collapse down for easy storage. This comes with a large and smaller colander, which is plenty for me, but if I needed another, I’d buy again without reservation. Wish I would have bought these long ago so I could get rid of my original colander that took up a ton of storage space in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: wvamazonwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. This is all that is needed. Perfect for a 1 person household and small kitchen with not a lot of storage. Great quality and super compact. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L.

customer_reviews.title: A really good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $9.98 at the time of purchase. I ordered this item because I needed a small compact strainer to rinse my rise and beans in. THe fact that they folded was just and added bonus. They seem to be well made and not some cheap material. I can say after purchasing them I use them more often than I realized. Its just so convenient to pull them out and put back up. I am satisfied with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Key Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for saving space
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly and are as described. We have such limited kitchen space but use a colander often so I'm happy to have found these. They are sturdy when you open them and the colors are exactly as pictured. A great buy wish I had found them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Save space without giving up quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new home with a slightly smaller kitchen than I am used to. Because of this, every inch of cabinet space is precious. IN my quest to conserve, I decided to look into collapsible products. I went back and forth on a lot of collapsible colanders before I chose this one. I am really satisfied with my choice. I got the green and grey, which is chic and clean looking. They close to almost completely flat, but they are more than big enough for what I need when popped open. I wish I could get more of my gadgets in a collapsible version!
customer_reviews.author: M. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. I have limited cabinet space and until recently used a metal strainer. The mesh started to come apart and it cut me a few times. I was looking for silicone so it's easy to clean and can withstand heat. These are perfect. The collapse so it fits anywhere. The big one is big enough for pasta and other large portions. It cleans easily and no cuts ! It fits perfectly in my cabinet and doesn't take up any room. I'm glad I found these. they are so much more efficient for me. On a side note, my kitchen is gray and red so it matches perfectly
customer_reviews.author: americancarol

customer_reviews.title: No feet, not adequate drainage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this strainer because it is collapsible, but I am not impressed! A strainer should strain the water or liquid. This doesn't do an adequate job for the following reasons. Cons~ * No drain holes on the sides or even near the edge of the bottom * No feet to help aid proper drainage Pros ~ Collapsible, takes up little space, but so what? Since it doesn't actually function properly, it now takes up TOO much space since it will be rarely if ever used. I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: D-M-R

customer_reviews.title: No holes on the sides
customer_reviews.text: These only have draining holes in the very bottom. They drain great, as long as you move the items around and they're not very dense. If you made a box of pasta, it is difficult to get all of the water out because there are no holes on the sides of the strainer. If you're rinsing off a small batch of fruit, or straining a small batch of pasta, they're great. Just be advised that the holes ONLY being on the bottom will change how well they drain.
customer_reviews.author: MDJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colanders. As you collect kitchen tools over the years, you really begin to appreciate how important space is in the kitchen. These things fold up really well, are well constructed and put up with all kinds of household abuse. They look nice, even after repeated washings in the dishwasher. They look as good now 6 months later as they did when I got them. They aren't huge by any stretch, but they will hold 1/2 lb cooked pasta. If you need a colander, don't get those chunky metal ones whose feet break off and rust in no time. These are super great.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyReaderTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 14 months
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Definitely saves space. A little tough to fully clean. Biggest issue is with durability. The smaller of the two colanders lasted about 14 months before it began to come apart at one of the creases. It's still functional and we use it just about every day, but it probably doesn't have too much life left. It seems like the material only has a finite number of times it'll withstand expanding and collapsing before it starts to break down.
customer_reviews.author: Sirrah

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy - Will not hold up to normal household use
customer_reviews.text: These cracked on the seams where they collapse after only a few months use. I used them fairly regularly & not in an unusual way. Never submerged them in boiling water but ran them through the dishwasher several times. It clearly said they were dishwasher safe too. They just weren’t made well enough to stand up to weekly home use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Collier

customer_reviews.title: Decent functionality but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for just over 2 years. Today I am replacing them with stainless steel. I thought they did a decent job straining noodles and washing fruit however a few months ago I noticed they started deteriorating a bit. The silicone feels grainy after washing and there are definite spots in the creases that show signs of wear. They were always hand washed and air dried. So as much as I liked the space saving of the collapsible colanders, I'm going back to something that will hopefully last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kbye

customer_reviews.title: was disappointed. There are no feet or holes on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used these today, was disappointed. There are no feet or holes on the side so you have to stand there and drain your food. I would usually put something in the colander and keep cooking other things. I thought I would just return the items, as I had bought them with Amazon prime, but when I tried to return them, they wanted to charge me $6.40 in shipping!! So I guess I will keep them but do not like them!
customer_reviews.author: ccowell3@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Came ripped
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a rip right along the seam. I was going to return, but it's such a pain to get to the post office to return them for a refund I just threw the one away and use the one which came un-harmed. They aren't very sturdy overall. I like the idea of being able to save space when putting away, but they need to be made of better material if their going to last any length of time. I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: QueenEvil

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my wife. The colanders we have now take up a fair amount of cabinet space so being able to collapse these saves us a ton of room. The build quality is top notch. The plastic bottoms and handles are sturdy and are attached securely. The only reason they got 4 stars is one of them discolored in a spot while straining meat. My wife said it’s nothing to be worried about, and the integrity of the colander is fine, but it seemed odd to me. All things being said they are a good product and wonderful space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Rico Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected difficult to fold up but good if you are one or two people with low demand is for spaghetti raining
customer_reviews.text: For a family of four these appear to be larger than they really were. The largest one is about the links of a normal man’s hand which just barely takes care of receiving the spaghetti without needing to be very careful. The second one that comes with it is even smaller. Please verify the size makes sense for your family before you buy. The colanders themselves are difficult to fold up
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in folds, then ripped apart!
customer_reviews.text: Not long after we received these we loved them! Worked as expected and took up alot less space. Then they started cracking where they fold to collapse. Well today it happened...that area of cracking developed a RIP! A huge one half way around the collander, an# small holes in the other half. They are great if you only want them to last a few months but not for long term use for sure. Will be returning them or asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Everett A Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I want to tell you about this product.
customer_reviews.text: Although this has worked for me, I will tell you about this product very seriously. When I sent them, they all felt good, but after using it for a while, I felt that some of them couldn’t work well for me. I had to waste time to clean them up. I was very happy that I could buy this product, but I I feel that this product is not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Li Zhao Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Nice but stiff
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but slightly different than what I was expecting. They are really hard to pop in and out...the silicone is just very stiff. Maybe they will soften up with use...I have used the smaller one nearly every day in the last week since I have bought it. It serves our purposes, I normally use it to drain things like noodles, potatoes, etc. I didn't notice it retaining water or anything like that like some others mentioned in the reviews. I do like the blue color. Overall they seem nice just stiffer than I envisioned.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great colander set!
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for at least 6 months, and they are still in as good of shape as when they arrived. I'm very pleased with this purchase. They pop out and fold up easily, hold a good amount of noodles, as well as beans, berries, and many other items, and stand up to boiling water without warping or discoloring. We have a very small kitchen and this has been a perfect way to conserve space. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: desertmommy3

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a Christmas present for a family member. The day after Christmas, it was put to use. The product itself is of great quallity and a great size. The fact that it has a collapsible design really makes it that much better especially when you have small or already full cabinets or drawers. The water drains at a decent rate, but could be improved a little. No melting or oily residue left on product after being used and it doesn't absorb strange smells. I would recommend this for the pasta lover.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jerez

customer_reviews.title: Good Colander, Just Not What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these were the soft silicone colanders that you can set inside a pot of simmering water and use them with the lip holding it up above the water. These are just the regular plastic colanders that you can buy anywhere. Oh well, they are good colanders, just not what I was actually looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: These collapsible colanders are simply great! We had a large stainless colander and while yes, it was nice, storage was a problem. These were the answer. Collapse both down and nest, ot takes up all of "maybe" 4" sitting flat. But, let me talk about the seller...⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ for their wonderful customer service, they reacted with an acceptable solution and had me fixed up in less than 48 hours. These folks could not be better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and small but they do flatten out!
customer_reviews.text: I use colanders to wash vegetables, strain cooked products and for pasta. I like that these are flattenable but they are cheaply made (seem inexpensive) and smallish. I blame myself for not viewing the dimensions of these before I bought them. That said I will keep them and use for less onerous kitchen tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: need to use two hands as its not pliable / easily bendable to do what you need
customer_reviews.text: returning these. impossible to open/ expand and close/collapse! Defeats the purpose. need to use two hands as its not pliable / easily bendable to do what you need. I have another collapsible strainer that is better quality, able to open and close easily, this one is impossible and not usable. Seeing other reviews here that the item melts; I did not actually use these, so can't speak to that, but I am not happy with the usability of the items, so I won't be finding out if they melt as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: They are nice but not sturdy. I have had them for less than two years and the one that I use the most is already ripping apart. It is a nice idea, being collapsible, but these do not hold up like the one I had before them. My mil bought me a collapsible one when I got married and it lasted 8 years. Trouble is I don’t know where she got it or what brand it was!
customer_reviews.author: Bryttani

customer_reviews.title: Might be tough for some to expand
customer_reviews.text: These colanders are easy to use and have nice bright colors! We really enjoy using them. One thing: we had intended to share one with my elderly mother, but expanding and collapsing them is tougher than we had imagined. I don't think she could manage it easily. Not a big deal if you have average strength in your hands, but perhaps the elderly or infirm should look for a non-collapsable option. Overal however, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Seams like a cheaper silicone interior
customer_reviews.text: Seams like cheaper silicone/plastic type interior then our prior one we had for numerous years, that our son took to college. But this still works welL, I just recommend that’s you be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rebischke

customer_reviews.title: Drained my food, but hard to collapse
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, did the job, but it was hard to collapse and unfold that I left it unfolded all the time because it was stiff. Threw one of them away when I moved, the other one is in storage that I don't plan to keep
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wood

customer_reviews.title: Better in every way
customer_reviews.text: My favorite colander! Easy to use. Easy to store. And most importantly, easy to clean. I highly recommend these to replace your big plastic colander with those little plastic feet at the bottom that are a pain to keep clean and takes up tons of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. I was sick of the huge colander made of metal that I had because it took up so much room. Saw these and liked them, liked two sizes offered and that they collapsed. Now I can store them easily and with little room taken up. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: toughteach

customer_reviews.title: A little small but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a pretty good set, If your working with space constraints this will work well for you. They are a little on the small side but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I started using it. But it lasted less than 1 year 😕 It started to fall apart and I can't fix it. I gave it a regular use, I was very carefull storing it. It's a shame...It was very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela De Hasty

customer_reviews.title: I like this colander
customer_reviews.text: I like this novel teal color, and that it collapses to take up less space, and it works well to drain pasta, and rinse-defrost frozen foods. I didn't really need a second smaller one but maybe I will find uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong.
customer_reviews.text: At first was really pleased but after the 4th use the small strainer started to tear as seen in the photo and of course has only gotten worse with use. The larger one is starting to tear as well, have only had these for 7 months or so. I don't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Look is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks a lot better than what you get. Quality is poor, it's similar to what you buy at Diaso discount store for. $1.5. I bought a better one on Amazon before that has metal bottom and rim. I need to buy another one like that but different color.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby C.

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but look and feels cheap. Fir the quality its over prices but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: syed

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: These do not open up as big as in the picture. Basically I don't think it would hold one box of mac and cheese to drain. Huge waist of money. I haven't been able to use them for anything...as flat as pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: Wow!

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy and only has very small holes in bottom so doesn't drain very well.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid design and coloring
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using the colander very much. Works great and cleans up easily, plus when they're collapsed don't take up much space at all, which is great for my single lifestyle and tiny apartment.
customer_reviews.author: KenFlynn25

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea of these because I’m always wanting to save space. But now that we’ve had them for 3 months they are showing signs of wear at the seams where they collapse. Not sure how much longer they’ll hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Storage is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. We do not have much cabinet space and we always need our strainer for something so we mainly keep it in the dish strainer. Not anymore! This strainer is so easy and compact. I looking for other items that collapses To replace our other dishes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Everything
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. It does it's job. It's fairly sturdy when opened up and has noodles or whatever in it. It's stiff enough to hold it's shape while using it. I personally would of liked the bottom to be raised up more than it is. It's maybe a half inch off the ground. The plastic ring that it's sits on should have been taller for faster draining, so the water doesn't pool up underneath it. And the plastic doesn't seem as solid as it could be. Kind of flimsy I think. But should get a few years of good use.
customer_reviews.author: Toshiba Pro

customer_reviews.title: drain holes only on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these! I was looking for something compact to replace a traditional colander. Unfortunately, there are only drain holes on the bottom of each colander making it difficult to truly drain completely without lots of shaking and stirring. Putting in for a return ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent colanders that fold up nice and thin. The small one will hold 1lb of pasta and the large at least 1.75 lbs. Perfect for cramping or home use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great set , great price
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot better than I thought for the price. Easy storage because they can collapse, there is a small/large depending on what I need to strain, and nothing has stuck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mason LH

customer_reviews.title: Average job
customer_reviews.text: There’s about 30 different virtually identical brands of these on Amazon. These are as good as any. Could be a little more height to the “feet” so water drains out underneath, but does job adequately.
customer_reviews.author: What?!?

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are collapsible but they do not have any drainage on the sides, only on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: KCartag

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they seemed to have great reviews. However, I've had them for 6 months and they are already shot. The seams where it folds have broken. Other than that the silicon holds up well. But, because the silicon has separated at the creases, I cannot use them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Easy To Store
customer_reviews.text: They and easy to store, easy to clean, and made of good quality. The large strainer could have been a little larger but works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome things...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are nice. How did I not know they existed before just recently? I’ve had them for a few months at least. Easy to collapse and throw in the dishwasher, making them very easy to clean. Take up very little space in the cabinets, too! After some consistent use, I can tell they are durable and will last me a long time. Fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeGroat

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this set. Takes up little space in my cupboard, the handles are helpful for draining pasta and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great strainer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great strainer. I love that it takes up so little space and washes well in the dishwasher. The only thing I dislike is that - after using it pretty regularly over the past year and a half - it still smells like plastic/rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Caffiend

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the two products, But the large one is smaller than I had expected, and I can't imagine what I'd use the smaller one for.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Won't last
customer_reviews.text: I've had these less than a year and one is already broken. They're super cute but not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: he seam between the rim and the silicone colander is poorly designed/constructed and didn't hold up for less than first few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: These are not well designed. Because the holes are only on the bottom of the collander, often the holes get clogged by the stuff you are trying to drain. This can cause boiling water to splash back up onto your hands when straining pasta, for example. At best, it's extremely inconvenient because it takes a long time to drain liquid. Not please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MargoPsu55

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I started off loving these things. Now several months later, I'm like, "Meh". There's nothing wrong with them. I'm sure they'll make great camping colanders, but for everyday use, I'm not so impressed. You could certainly do worse, that's for sure. I can't say I'd buy them again if these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: John G.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great storage saver
customer_reviews.text: My old roommate loved to use the mesh-type colander, but they are hell to clean!!!! So these aren't only easy to clean but also are great space savers since they pop down.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hovey

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Saves space. Not silicone.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I am moving to collapsible to save space, and these do the job. Note that these are not silicone -- I didn't read the description carefully enough, and I did not realize these are not silicone until after I received them. They are a stiffer material.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Shops Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Great for space. Easy to clean. Drains well. Had prior problems with a metal colander not draining well and these really did the trick! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CRose

customer_reviews.title: These are the best! Easy to clean and store!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to clean, if needed on the top rack of the dish. They fold in to just a couple inches which make storage so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t strain!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it folds for easy storage but I don’t like that it doesn’t strain well. The holes are only on the bottom and they need to be on the sides too. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have holes on the sides; drains slow
customer_reviews.text: I like how it collapses, but I wish it had holes on the side. I dumped in a pot of boiled noodles, and the water took forever to drain out the bottom. My plastic colander has holes all over, and the water drains out almost immediately. I will keep it because it takes up less space, but it annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Netland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had grown tired of the plastic one I've had because it simply took up more space than I would have liked. I absolutely love that these collapse! I only needed the smaller one so I gave the larger one to my mother and she too is enamored with the design! The different colors are fun too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Vallejos

customer_reviews.title: I especially like them because they are collapsible
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost daily. I especially like them because they are collapsible, space saving. Thanks, alice
customer_reviews.author: Alice's K.

customer_reviews.title: This product was much smaller than expected. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was much smaller than expected. It is as described. I just failed to measure my existing colandar to compare. The quality of the product is more than acceptable. Normally, I would return it because it is not as expected by being too small. However, I will keep the product because return shipping is not free and the item was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to wipe and that it's not made of metal. And the most important part is that it's collapsible. A HUGE PLUS! I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K A

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them a short time so I can't comment on durability. But they work and being collapsible are easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I had been needing a colander for awhile and just hadn't really done much to fix that. Then I saw these. I get that collapsible colanders have been around for a bit but these spoke to me. Now they're on my wall and look, and work, great!
customer_reviews.author: Kobuu

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Since they are collapsible and easy to store is very correct and they also seem to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Litenin

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Sturdy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing some of my kitchen items one by one. I was a little leery about getting these. I am so glad I decided to get them. Very nice, sturdy, easy to clean. Really good product.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Strong and collapsible
customer_reviews.text: I loved that set! They are collapsible and come in 2 different sizes. They are strong and I saved so much space! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Dragone

customer_reviews.title: Good colanders for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, and they collapse into each other and store in a relatively small space in the cabinet, unlike regular colanders that take up half a shelf. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Annie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking up less space, and work well
customer_reviews.text: Great for camper! Have a pop up and needed a strainer but didnt want to take up space with a normal one. These work perfect and don't take up hardly any space because the small one folded up fits inside the big one when folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful if you don't have the space. But cleaning you need to be careful will fall apart easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Harden

customer_reviews.title: was great but falling apart within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was great space saver. NOT already falling apart after only 6 uses the small colander. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS. Only last few uses. Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.author: cytherea

customer_reviews.title: Just be kind to your new colander
customer_reviews.text: I love the collapsible colanders! Very nice and space saving. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Thin Material,  and Small Holes
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I was expecting a quality item. It is certainly not. All of the bottom holes are very small. And the rubber material is not think enough so it is wavy around the circular portion. It's very light weight as well because it's cheap. I'm returning the items. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these colanders.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these colanders. Love the blue color. Easy to use. Using every day when cleaning vegetables for salads.
customer_reviews.author: rvwer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new collapsible colanders. They are easy to use, work great, love the 2 different sizes and leaves me so much space in my cabinet!! Was great to replace my 2 open size colanders!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine O'Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap colanders
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I don't use these every day, so I suspect these will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Space savers
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're easy to clean, bigger than I expected when you expand them, and take up so much less space than my other colanders.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The solution I didn’t realize I needed. Such a space saver and so much sturdier/easier to clean than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: A Colander's Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a godsend because they don't take up a lot of room and the sizes are great for smaller portions. However, the holes in the colander itself are so small that water gathers at the bottom and nothing actually gets drained. This is, of course, an issue considering this is a colander.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They take up no room at all! You can even fold them down when you put them in the dishwasher! If you are on the fence BUY THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Christophor Wilson

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR BROWNIE POINTS
customer_reviews.text: I scored major brownie points when I bought these as a gift for my mom--she is obsessed with them. She brings them up all the time! She loves that they are so easy to clean and store. I have tried them out several times as well, and I have to agree, they are excellent! I would obviously purchase them again, and I will definitely be buying a set for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!
customer_reviews.text: I have already used the collapsible colanders. They are easy to pop-up and use, so quick to clean and store in a small space. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They are very sturdy and work well for straining veggies will be ordering more very soon
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dye

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & don't work well - don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: These collapse nicely but they are cheaply made. Wish i had used them sooner and returned. The holes are not drilled properly or located properly so when you use them a large amount of water stays in the colander. They don't drain well.
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has very little kitchen storage space these are absolutely perfect! I love how they collapse and are easy to store away but still function great when I take them out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great strainers
customer_reviews.text: They are a solid durable material and collapse perfectly. I've had no problems collapsing them then washing them in the dishwasher. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product on arrival but made right by Supplier; Home & Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter who lives in another state. She loves to cook and has limited storage space so these are perfect for her. The seal had separated from the rim on the large colander. After notifying the supplier, they immediately sent out another one to her. Love this kind of customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love these
customer_reviews.text: I now have extra space in my cabinets and no longer have to struggle getting them out. They stay in place when needed and wash really well. Marie Kondo would be proud of me. LOL
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Won't last!
customer_reviews.text: Mesh section began to separate from the main frame almost immediately. "Feet" are too short for good drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Kronungen

product_meta.title: Colander Set - 2 Collapsible Colanders (Strainers) Set By Comfify - Includes 2 Folding Strainers Sizes 8" - 2 Quart and 9.5" - 3 Quart Red and Grey
feature_bullets: BEST COLANDER SET FOR YOUR KITCHEN - Works for draining most foods like spaghetti, pasta, potatoes, broccoli, green beans, carrots, spinach and other veggies. User these strainers to rinse your salad leafs, fruits and fresh vegetables.

COLLAPSIBLE, FOLDING, SPACE SAVING DESIGN - Ergonomic, space-saving design. Strainers are foldable, so they do not take up much needed room in your kitchen cupboards. Collapsed strainers is less than 2 inches high!
USE AS COLANDER FOR TWO POT SIZES. The two included food strainers are 8 and 9.5 inches in diameter. Now you can work with two food products at the same time and use on different pot sizes.

COMFORTABLE & SAFE - The handles are comfortable, soft and rubberized. HEAT RESISTANT UP TO 230ºF. These strainers can be quickly immersed into boiling water blanch vegetables like spinach broccoli, green beans etc.

HAPPY CUSTOMERS ONLY: We're so confident that you'll love our product, that we'll give your hard-earned money back if you're not thrilled with your purchase. Simply contact our friendly customer service team to make it right.
